name: Payon Artifact token
description: Reward for the Guardians of Payon 1, use to redeem Artifact shards of Bow and Knuckles

name: Payon's Chest
description: Open the box, you will certainly receive some Colorful Shell, with a probability to receive Pearl, Soft Feather, Orc Claw, Bloody Rune, Bell, Mercury, Amethyst, Pet EXP Potion (S), Pet EXP Potion (M), Pet EXP Potion (L), etc.

name: Payon's Memory
description: A wizard music record. With it, You can order songs in the music box spot newly designed by Kafra. [Listening to the flying time and the growth of a tree, I gradually fell asleep. I often dream of grandma, Her face... I miss her so much...]

name: Peace Maker
description: Elf Elder Decurry's shield. Legend has it that Decurry was a peace-loving elder, and anyone who fought with him would be influenced by his love for peace. But there is another legend that Decurry's shield had the blessing of the God of Nature. As long as he held up the shield, No attack could harm him, so he was fearless. This shield is also called Peace Maker by the elves. (Recommended to use it as a weapon appearance.)

name: Peak Shard
description: It's said that Alice Fona in the Guild territory is collecting this item. Handing this to Alice will do good to your job.

name: Pearl
description: Pink Glowing Gem. Being a very rare item, it can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Pegasus Wing Ears
description: Accessory made of Pegasus Wing feathers of Valkyrie Randgris. The wearer will become lighter according to the ability.

name: Pegasus Wing Ears [1]
description: Accessory made of Pegasus Wing feathers of Valkyrie Randgris. The wearer will become lighter according to the ability.

name: Pegasus Wing Ears [1] Blueprint
description: Accessory made of Pegasus Wing feathers of Valkyrie Randgris. The wearer will become lighter according to the ability.

name: Perm Demon
description: The balloon made by the Devil Soul. With it, the wearer can get terribly powerful, but the mind will be gradually eroded.

name: Pet Apron
description: A skirt maded of sea grass. It's dancing in an incredible rhythm.
